title: BRAND detail page Â» CAR MODELS
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see all CAR MODELS that a BRAND has made in its history\
So I can get an overview over their range of cars
description:
* The BRAND detail page contains a section with a list of all connected CAR MODELS.
* Each CAR MODEL in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each CAR MODEL in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each CAR MODEL in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no CAR MODEL connected to the BRAND then the section is not displayed at all.
